text: Ni shuo: Wo gaosu nimen zai zhenzhu nali suo shou de baochou you bi zhe geng elie de, hao maï¹–you deng ren ceng shou zhu de qi jue he qian nu, ta shi tamen-bufen bian cheng houzi he zhu, yibufen chongbai emo, zhe deng ren, tamen di diwei shi geng elie de, tamen likai zhengdao shi geng yuan de.
